== Engandiyur (627789) ==

Engandiyur is a village in the [[Chavakkad]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 1411 hectares and harbouring 5760 households with total population of 23101 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Chavakkad]] is at a distance of 8 km. Male population is 10528 and female population is 12573. Scheduled Caste Population is 615 and Scheduled Tribes population is 45. Census Location Code of the village is 627789<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
